      static void Layer4.receiveFromLayer3(Layer3Frame frame, Host host) 
      static void Layer3.receiveFromLayer4(Layer3Frame frame, byte[] finalDestination, Host host)
      This method will receive a packet from layer 4, assign a next hop and a checksum and send it down to layer 2
      static void Layer2.recieveFromLayer1(Layer2Frame frame, Host host)
      Receives a Layer2 frame from layer 1, performs the required processing and passes a Leyer3 frame to Layer3
      static void Layer2.recieveFromLayer3(Layer3Frame frame, byte[] nextHopAddress, Host host)
      Receives IP packets from layer 3, performs required layer 2 processing and hands a Layer 2 frame to Layer 1.
      static void Layer4.sendToLayer3(java.io.File fileToSend, Host host, byte[] destIPAddress)
      This functionality is designed for when a node wants to initiate sending a file, receiving it from the host and sending to an specific destination IP address.
